trans-unit.source: Converts managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> objects to unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structures, and vice versa.
None of the methods of this class will validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: Ninguno de los métodos de esta clase validará el <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para validarla, utilice <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the printer that is bound to the new <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> instance.
The Print Schema version to use in the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> and DEVMODE conversion.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> class for the specified printer.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la estructura DEVMODE, consulte [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="deviceName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="clientPrintSchemaVersion" /> is 0 or less.
The converter was unable to bind to <paramref name="deviceName" />.
Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the DEVMODE structure.
Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
The new managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la estructura DEVMODE, consulte [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

trans-unit.source: The scope of the returned <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> is the entire print job.
trans-unit.target: El ámbito de devuelto <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> es todo el trabajo de impresión.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida el <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para validarla, utilice <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> is already disposed.
The value of <paramref name="devMode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The content of <paramref name="devMode" /> is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> buffer containing the DEVMODE structure to convert.
A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> value that specifies whether the new <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> applies to a page, a document, or an entire print job.
Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that has the specified scope.
The new <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida el <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para validarla, utilice <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la estructura DEVMODE, consulte [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> is already disposed.
The value of <paramref name="devMode" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The content of <paramref name="devMode" /> is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The <paramref name="scope" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> value.
Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to convert.
A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.

Converts the specified managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
The scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parameter must be the entire print job.
trans-unit.target: El ámbito de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parámetro debe ser todo el trabajo de impresión.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida el <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para validarla, utilice <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la estructura DEVMODE, consulte [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> is already disposed.
The value of <paramref name="printTicket" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The content of <paramref name="printTicket" /> is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The <paramref name="baseType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType" /> value.
The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to convert.
A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.

A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> value that specifies whether the conversion of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> should be done at the scope of a page, a document, or an entire print job.

Converts the specified managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> with the specified scope, into an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> buffer that represents the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida el <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

trans-unit.source: To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para validarla, utilice <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la estructura DEVMODE, consulte [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> is already disposed.
The value of <paramref name="printTicket" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The content of <paramref name="printTicket" /> is not well-formed.
The conversion failed.
The <paramref name="baseType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType" /> value.
-or-
The <paramref name="scope" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope" /> value.
Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" />.
Gets the maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> can support.
The maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> can support.
trans-unit.target: El valor máximo [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) versión que <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> puede admitir.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter" /> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a `Dispose` cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método `Dispose` deja el <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a `Dispose`, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a `Dispose` antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> del objeto `Finalize`.
